channel.title: Comments on: AfrikaBurn 101: a survival guide

item.title: By: Darren Bruce-Brand
item.dc:creator: Darren Bruce-Brand
item.description: Awesome article! This year will be my 1st Burn! Cannot wait. Will be doing 5 days....
item.content:encoded: Awesome article! This year will be my 1st Burn! Cannot wait. Will be doing 5 days….

item.title: By: Sarah Duff
item.dc:creator: Sarah Duff
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/afrikaburn-101-survival-guide/#comment-231650">Eva</a>.
Five days is certainly enough to get the full experience, but there's something special about staying for the whole week - I think there's more of a mind shift the longer you stay. If you do stay for a week, you need to pace yourself a bit when it comes to partying and staying up really late, otherwise you'll be beyond shattered by the end of it!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Eva.

Five days is certainly enough to get the full experience, but there’s something special about staying for the whole week – I think there’s more of a mind shift the longer you stay. If you do stay for a week, you need to pace yourself a bit when it comes to partying and staying up really late, otherwise you’ll be beyond shattered by the end of it!

item.title: By: Eva
item.dc:creator: Eva
item.description: Thanks for a great article! Do you recommend to stay the full 7 days or for first timers 5 days is enough?
item.content:encoded:
Thanks for a great article!
Do you recommend to stay the full 7 days or for first timers 5 days is enough?

item.title: By: Sarah Duff
item.dc:creator: Sarah Duff
item.description: Hi Bianca, what an awesome project! I'd love to see your design when you're finished.
item.content:encoded: Hi Bianca, what an awesome project! I’d love to see your design when you’re finished.

item.title: By: Bianca Ross
item.dc:creator: Bianca Ross
item.description: Hi Sarah, I study graphic design and for our 1st product of the new term we have to design a new logo concerning AFRIKABURN. (oo,) Its very exciting to take on a theme project like AFRIKABURN because its so vibrant and energetic. When I am finished, I would like to send you my design if that will be okay with you.
item.content:encoded: Hi Sarah, I study graphic design and for our 1st product of the new term we have to design a new logo concerning AFRIKABURN. (oo,) Its very exciting to take on a theme project like AFRIKABURN because its so vibrant and energetic. When I am finished, I would like to send you my design if that will be okay with you.
